page.title: 10COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {COMMUNICATION.}The Post Office is next to the White Hart and used to be part of an inn next to the old Wool Hall .Coggeshall's Post Office does not sort letters but sends them straight to Colchester.A first class stamp costs 17p and a second class stamp costs 13p.The post boxes in Coggeshall are at the Post Office,just before the Vicarage,outside Honywood Stores and at Monkdowns Road.The collecting times are morning and evening but they don't collect on Sundays or Bank Holidays.Postmen use bicycles and vans for deliveries. Almost 90% of people in Coggeshall have one or more telephones.Coggeshall has a telephone exchange next to Saunders garage in East Street. Coggeshall has a system called S.T.D which means you can telephone almost anywhere in the world.
